issue.title: [Python] First draft of the PyArrow build setup changes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16342](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16342). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From the list of tasks needed to make CMake changes to integrate C++ compilation for the `arrow/python` folder as part of the PyArrow build setup make a first draft.
